PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12982022-12-02,  ,  IAIC,  , 
ActCanada Infrastructure Bank Act
PrecisAppointment of ANDRÉE-LISE MÉTHOT, O.Q., of Frelighsburg, Quebec, to be a director of the board of directors of the Canada Infrastructure Bank, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Christopher John Hickman, whose term has expired.
